text: mēlum, enta āṉmāvum (muṉṉarē) eḻutappaṭṭirukkum tavaṇaikku iṇaṅka, allāhaviṉ aṉumatiyiṉṟi, maraṇippatillai. Evarēṉum inta ulakattiṉ palaṉai (maṭṭum) virumpiṉāl, nām avarukku atiliruntē vaḻaṅkuvōm;. Iṉṉum evar, maṟumaiyiṉ naṉmaiyai virumpukiṟārō avarukku atiliruntu vaḻaṅkuvōm;. Naṉṟiyuṭaiyōrukku ati cīkkaramāka naṟkūli koṭukkiṟōm
